title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to block SNAP funding order
shortDescription: The Trump administration filed a last-minute appeal with the Supreme Court to not have to pay full SNAP food aid benefits to millions of Americans.

title: President Trump says US will boycott G20 summit in South Africa
shortDescription: President Trump said no US officials will attend the upcoming G20 summit in South Africa, citing the treatment of white South African farmers.

title: 'They're jealous': Trump hosts MAGA hero Viktor Orban
shortDescription: Orban, who has clamped down on the Hungarian press and the liberal opposition, is a hero to many in the MAGA movement.

title: Trump pardons MLB star Darryl Strawberry for tax evasion conviction
shortDescription: President Trump has pardoned retired baseball star Darryl Strawberry for a tax evasion conviction three decades ago.

title: Watch Trump's reaction to Zohran Mamdani's NYC mayoral election win.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reacted to the 2025 election by piling on the communist accusations about Zohran Mamdani. See what they had to say.

title: Democrats outline new proposal for ending shutdown
shortDescription: Senate Democrats on Friday offered Republicans a compromise to end the shutdown that would include a one-year extension of Obamacare subsidies.

title: President Trump to attend Lions-Commanders game this Sunday
shortDescription: Trump is going to the game at Northwest Stadium in Landover, Maryland, home of the Commanders, to take in a Veteran's Day celebration at halftime.

title: Small businesses take on Trump's tariffs at Supreme Court
shortDescription: The Supreme Court will now decide whether President Donald Trump's sweeping tariff policy is legal.

title: Fact-checking Trump's post saying Walmart Thanksgiving cost is down 25%
shortDescription: President Trump said costs are down for 2025 Thanksgiving meal, per Walmart. The holiday bundle from the mega retailer is down, but it has fewer items.

title: Flight cancelations increase pressure on Congress over shutdown
shortDescription: After furloughs and SNAP benefits, the latest pressure on Congress to end the shutdown is coming from canceled flights hurting travel.

title: Trump administration appeals order to pay full November SNAP food aid
shortDescription: The Trump administration is appealing a judge's order for it to provide full SNAP food aid benefits to states by Nov. 7.

title: Government shutdown drags on as Trump seeks to block SNAP order: Recap
shortDescription: The Trump administration appealed to the Supreme Court a federal judgeâ€™s order to provide full SNAP benefits for November.

title: Republicans are losing this key voting bloc. Can Dems win them back?
shortDescription: Democrats swept 2025 elections across the country, in part, because of a surge in support among Latino voters. Here's why it matters for 2026.

title: What is Trump's approval rating? Polling aggregators hit new lows
shortDescription: Trump won the 2024 presidential election a year ago. Democrats won big in 2025. What is Trump's approval rating as the government shutdown drags on?
